headline: Is Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Quietly Undervalued After Its Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) has been grinding along quietly, but its mix of steady revenue growth and softer long term returns makes the stock worth another look for patient, income oriented investors. See our latest analysis for Keurig Dr Pepper. At around $28.33, Keurig Dr Pepper has seen a respectable 1 month share price return of just over 7 percent, but its 1 year total shareholder return of roughly negative 11 percent shows that sentiment is only cautiously improving rather than surging. If...
